name: image_scoring
description: Agent that generates images based on user prompts and scores their adherence to the prompt.

skills.name: Generate and Score Image
skills.description: Generates an image from a given text prompt and then evaluates how well the generated image adheres to the original prompt, providing a score.
examples: Generate an image of a futuristic city at sunset
Create an image of a cat playing a piano
Show me an image of a serene forest with a hidden waterfall
